item.description:
Hi everyone!

I thought this would be a great time for the Boston Atheists! The band playing that evening is Entrain and they are fantastic! I used to follow them when I lived in Salem ages ago.

Tickets are $28 each so I would suggest purchasing a ticket directly through the link and letting me know so I can keep a tally. I hope folks are interested! Also, there is a pre-party beginning at 6pm at the Landing which I plan on attending too.

About the Rock and Blues Concert Cruises
Cruises depart from the Boston Harbor Cruise gates at Long Wharf, adjacent to the Long Wharf Marriott and across from the New England Aquarium on Atlantic Avenue. Boats board 1/2 hour before the time listed on website.

Cruises generally last three hours and are general admission. There is a cash bar on board. Ticket holders must be 21+.

Rock and Blues Cruises are available for charter for corporate events and community group outings. For information on private cruises and group ticket sales for our existing calendar of events, please email info@rockandbluescruise.com or call the Rock and Blues Cruise Info Line at 617-431-1175.


http://www.rockandblu...
item.name: Rock and Blues Boston Harbor Cruise
